snippet: An American historian whose aphorism appears on TheRealGeorgeZimmerman.com, is "not happy" to have been quoted by the neighborhood watch volunteer who shot and killed the unarmed teenager Trayvon Martin in Florida.
abstract: An American historian whose aphorism appears on TheRealGeorgeZimmerman.com, is "not happy" to have been quoted by the neighborhood watch volunteer who shot and killed the unarmed teenager Trayvon Martin in Florida.

headline.main: Florida Prosecutor to Release 'New Information' About Trayvon Martin Shooting
